meta.name: description
meta.content: We are a community of learners. We will do whatever it takes to learn. We are building a strong foundation by believing we can, working our plan, then FEELING the POWER of SUCCESS!

span.strong: School DISMISSAL NOW EXTENDED UNTIL MAY 21, 2020

div.p: We are a community of learners. We will do whatever it takes to learn. We are building a strong foundation by believing we can, working our plan, then FEELING the POWER of SUCCESS!
We are a community of learners. We will do whatever it takes to learn. We are building a strong foundation by believing we can, working our plan, then feeling the power of success!
We strive to communicate effectively, build strong character and social responsibility, and use high levels of thinking skills.
We are a community of learners. We will do whatever it takes to learn. We are building a strong foundation by believing we can, working our plan, then FEELING the POWER of SUCCESS!

div.style: background:url('/files/galleries/Student Info.jpg') center center no-repeat; background-size:cover;

div.p: Applications for the 2019-2020 school year are now available for students entering Kindergarten through 7th grade. These applications are valid for students turning 5 years old on or before September 1, 2019.

The lottery for the 2019-2020 school year will take place on February 1, 2019. All applications received after January 31st will be added to the waitlist and applicants will be contacted as open spots become available.
